Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored the 58th-minute opener for Scotland
Che Adams volleyed home John McGinn's cross in the 85th minute
Liam Cooper limped off in the second half with an injury
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland had gone seven games without a win before the trip to Portugal
Clarke handed a debut to Bristol City right-back Ross McCrorie while James Forrest was back in the Scotland team for the first time since the previous European Championship finals
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke's side suffered another Euro 2024 injury scare during a 2-0 warm-up victory over Gibraltar football
Clarke had four players missing from his match-day squad as they work their way back from injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar got their first effort at goal just before the interval but Zander Clark made a comfortable save from Ethan Britto
Forrest thought he should have had a penalty with his desire to stay on his feet after the challenge seeming to work against him
